word: PAGE 342. ATTITUDE TOWARD THE TESTIMONIES: THE STATEMENT THAT SOME WHO STOOD AS COUNSELORS HAD DECLARED "THAT THEY WOULD NOT RECEIVE THE TESTIMONIES GIVEN" HIGHLIGHTS THE SITUATION WHICH EXISTED IN THE MID-1890'S AS DESCRIBED IN THE HISTORICAL FOREWORD. HOWEVER, AT THE GENERAL CONFERENCE SESSION OF 1901, MORE MEN WHO WERE FIRM IN THEIR CONFIDENCE IN THE SPIRIT OF PROPHECY WERE DRAWN INTO POSITIONS OF LEADERSHIP.
